name: RADARjAM (itch)
description:
RADARjAM is a top down shooter, where you try to kill as many enemies as possible with the assistance of your sonar.

[W] -Accelerate forward

[A] -Accelerate to the left

[S] -Accelerate backwards

[D] -Accelerate to the right

[R] -Restart the game 

Left Mouse Button is to shoot

Right Mouse Button is to activate the Sonar

Your charge is the most important thing! It controls every aspect of the game. Use it wisely.
